interpretations.explanation: This result is outside the safe range and requires immediate medical attention.
interpretations.why_it_matters: Values at this level may indicate a serious medical condition.
interpretations.next_steps: Seek urgent medical attention immediately. Contact your healthcare provider or go to the nearest emergency facility.
